import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = ({ isLoggedIn }) => { const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); const toggleDropdown = () => { setIsDropdownOpen(!isDropdownOpen); }; return (
